title: T.K. Coleman: There's a Better Version of Yourself on the Other Side of Fear
description:
On Twitter the other day in the midst of the frenzy I posted links to some of my favorite black voices having productive conversations about race. Someone suggested I follow TK and talk to him. I am so glad that I did. This conversation was what I needed. 

You can find him at https://fee.org/rev1 and on Twitter at https://twitter.com/TK_Coleman

Conversation notes
John McWhorter

Family of 5 Chicago, Pentecostal all black church in chicago
Washington and Cicero
Work is distinct from a job. 
College on a theater scholarship
Conservative culturally but not politically
Crisis of faith
Intervarsity and campus crusade
Ravi Zacharias international ministries Just thinking
Went straight to the philosophy department
Dr. Timothy McGrew

When you get redemption wrong, you get repentance wrong

The world is a cancel culture, Christianity is a compassion culture

God's ultimate aim is to redeem them.
The purpose of rebuke is to understand
Rich Dad, Poor Dad, Robert Kiasaki
Financial literacy and the meaning of life
Financial Advisor at American Express

It's not failure that people fear, but being alone when it comes time to own the consequences.
Uturn on Weed, Page kennedy

American Idol

The most interesting thinkers are the people who are willing to take risks

Pearl of great price is not a dream come true, but it is the person you get to become by being true to those dreams. 

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays me a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. This is is one (free to you) way to support my videos. 

To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A


On the other side of fear a version of yourself that is superior to who you are right not in every single way. 

The mere act of pursuing a dream leaves you transformed. 

Don't treat your purpose in life as an intellectual puzzle to be resolved by naval gazing. There are things that you can only know by engaging reality. They use the "will of god" as a way of hiding. I'll use that way to give me guarantees. 

The way to get stuck is to stop growing from within that position. 

Education director discoverpraxis.com 

Criticize by creating
Apprenticeships for the white collar world.

Director of entreapenurial for FEE

Popularizing the economic way of thinking

Help with the building of black communities

Mr Magigorian wonder emporium
